A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Jedi is definitely one of my favorite films of the franchise. This is what I call a huge fan service to people who love Star Wars as it has a great story that delivers emotional weight\, with great acting\, especially from Mark Hamill\, Carrie Fisher\, Daisy Ridley\, & Adam Driver. With a film that's 152 minutes\, trust me\, you'll be kept entertained with the amazing action this film has too. \nGrade: A
